source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you would lose Winning Streak!, you have a chance to instead gain maximum stacks of Winning Streak! for 4s. These cannot be removed and have 50% additional effect while immune to removal.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 3,509 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 515 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,383 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Fangs of the Devourer

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
